translations.translation: We will brand him on the snout!
We shall brand him on the muzzle.
Soon shall We brand him on his snout.
We shall brand him on his nose.
We will soon singe his pig-nose.
We shall brand him on the snout (nose)!
We will brand him on the nose.
We shall brand him upon the muzzle!
We shall brand him on the nose.
Soon We will brand him on the nose.
Anon We shall brand him on snout.
Soon We shall brand him on his snout.
Soon shall We brand (the beast) on the snout!
We shall brand him over the nose!
We shall mark him upon his nose!
We will brand him on the muzzle.
We will brand him upon the snout.

[68:16] We shall brand him on the snout: We shall leave a distinguishing mark upon his nose, one by which he will be reviled for as long as he lives; and so his nose was chopped off by a sword at Badr.
(We shall brand him on the nose) We shall hit him on the nose; and it is said this means: We shall hit him on the face; and it is also said this means: his face will be darkened. 683

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { سَنَسِمُهُ عَلَى ٱلْخُرْطُومِ } أي عَلَى الأَنفِ

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: وبالجملة: لا تعطه يا أكمل الرسل، ولا تلتفت إلى ثروته وسيادته، فإنَّا بمقتضى قهرنا وجلالنا { سَنَسِمُهُ } ونُعلِّمه بالكيِّ { عَلَى ٱلْخُرْطُومِ } [القلم: 16] أي: أنفه، بحيث يعرف به في عرصات المحشر

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
